description: Test prompts for Mindmap generation at different complexity levels

simple: Create a basic mindmap of the main topics
Generate a simple concept map showing key relationships
Map out the primary ideas in a hierarchical structure
standard: Generate a comprehensive mindmap showing relationships, subconcepts, and connections
Create a detailed concept map with multiple levels and clear organization
Develop a structured mindmap capturing main themes and their relationships
detailed: Generate an extensive mindmap with multiple levels, detailed subconcepts, and rich connections
Create an in-depth concept map showing complex relationships, dependencies, and hierarchies
Produce a sophisticated mindmap with comprehensive coverage of all concepts and their interrelationships
comprehensive: Generate a complete mindmap with exhaustive concept coverage, multi-level hierarchies, and detailed annotations
Create a full-featured concept map with extensive branching, rich metadata, and comprehensive relationship mapping
Develop a premium mindmap with complete knowledge structure, detailed explanations, and professional visualization
